snippet: Five Pakistani soldiers were killed in attacks on northwestern border checkpoints launched by dozens of militants based in Afghanistan, Pakistan's military said on Monday, as officials demanded that the neighboring country rein in such violence....

headline.main: Kremlin Says Seriously Worried About North Korea Missile Drills
headline.print_headline: Kremlin Says Seriously Worried About North Korea Missile Drills

lead_paragraph: Five Pakistani soldiers were killed in attacks on northwestern border checkpoints launched by dozens of militants based in Afghanistan, Pakistan's military said on Monday, as officials demanded that the neighboring country rein in such violence.
